name: Harpy Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner screech with the Harpy Name Generator! Find the perfect moniker that captures the wild, untamed spirit of these mythical creatures. Warning: May cause sudden urges to build nests and collect shiny objects.
introduction: Ever wondered what your name would be if you were a fearsome harpy, soaring through the skies and striking fear into the hearts of mortals? Well, wonder no more! Our Harpy Name Generator is here to craft the ideal appellation, blending ferocity with a touch of mythical elegance. Get ready to embrace your winged alter ego!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button. (It's the one that looks like it's about to take flight!)
Marvel at the awesome harpy name that appears before your very eyes.
Not feeling it? No problem! Click 'Generate' again and again until you find the name that truly resonates with your inner avian warrior.
Bonus points: Use your new harpy name to intimidate your friends and family. (We are not responsible for any resulting chaos.)

faqs.question: What exactly *is* a harpy?
faqs.answer: Harpies are mythological creatures, often depicted as having the body of a bird and the face of a woman. They're known for being fierce, greedy, and generally unpleasant. Basically, the Karens of the sky.

faqs.question: Are these names suitable for my pet bird?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! If you want your feathered friend to have a truly intimidating name, look no further. Just be prepared for your parrot to start demanding sacrifices.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my D&D character?
faqs.answer: Yes, indeed! These names are perfect for any harpy-inspired characters you might be creating. They're guaranteed to add a touch of mythical menace to your game.

faqs.question: Is this generator scientifically accurate?
faqs.answer: About as scientifically accurate as a unicorn riding a skateboard. This is pure, unadulterated fun, so don't expect any peer-reviewed studies on harpy nomenclature.

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the generated names?
faqs.answer: Keep clicking! The beauty of a generator is that you can create endless possibilities. And hey, if all else fails, you can always mix and match prefixes and suffixes to create your own unique abomination... I mean, *masterpiece*.

faqs.question: Will using a harpy name give me the ability to fly?
faqs.answer: Sadly, no. But it *will* give you the ability to sound incredibly cool while ordering takeout. Try it. We dare you.
